content:
a larger size 82x111 version can be found here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ shown on cover of coats & clark o n t #308 old and new favorites the rose motifs are separated by plain motif squares **materials ** j & p coats knit-cro-sheen art a 64 *or* clarks o n t mercerized bedspread cotton art b 504 *single size bed* 66 x 108 inches 168 x 274 cm 35 balls of white 10 balls of mid rose and 2 balls of hunter s green *double bed* 78 x 108 inches 198 x 274 cm 42 balls white 12 balls mid rose and 3 balls hunter s green steel crochet hook no 7
**gauge ** each motif measures 6 inches 15 25 cm square ******can be made with worsted yarn see photo with an h hook and be a 12 afghan square ****** 1 https //www freepatterns com/crochet/for-the-home/general-decor/rose-bower
